actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President of the United States shall, with the help of the Congress, address comprehensive tax reform within the first 240 days of the President's administration.
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents
